title: Tom Pidcock’s High-Stakes Bike Swap: How Q36.5 Dialed in His Transition to Scott and SRAM
content:
'Tom knows what he wants': All the key changes behind Pidcock's new setup came together just weeks before his high-pressure season debut with Q36.5.

Read the full article at Tom Pidcock’s High-Stakes Bike Swap: How Q36.5 Dialed in His Transition to Scott and SRAM on Velo.
author: ahood
